msbt.message: I wanna get to know you better. So how's that for an icebreaker?Seriously, kiddo, I got questions.
I wanna get to know folks here on the island better, and reckon you're a good one to start with. Socan I ask you somethin'?
I seem to recall you tellin' me you were into Is that still true, ?
I thought so! It's like I was just sayin' to I said, "Speakin' of , that is super into !"So that wasn't just one of my usual tall tales? Go figure. Gahaha!
Am I rememberin' this right? Didn't you tell me you were a fan of ?And would you say you still are?
That's what I thought! It's like I was just sayin' to I said, "That sure likes !"So I actually knew what I was talkin' about? Well, go figure. Gahaha!
When I asked you about your very favorite before, you said So wouldja say your taste's the same now, ?

Glad to hear it, 'cause I just told that you liked
I'd sure hate to learn I've been spreadin' untruths about you.

When I asked you about your very favorite before, you said
So wouldja say your taste's the same now, ?

Glad to hear it, 'cause I just told that you liked
I'd sure hate to learn I've been spreadin' untruths about you.
I recollect askin' you once about your future goal, Are you still shootin' to be someday?
Gotcha! Glad I remembered right. 'Cause I sorta already told that to , Hate to have to go back and admit I was way off base with that one.Anyway, we both said you'll make a great !
I recollect askin' you once about your future goal, So's your dream job still ?
Gotcha! Glad I remembered right. 'Cause I sorta already told that to , Hate to have to go back and admit I was way off base with that one.Anyway, we both said you'll make a great !
I remember you tellin' me about your hobby once Wouldja say you're still into ?
Good to hear! 'Cause I sorta already told you liked . If you'd changed hobbies in the meantime, I'd look like a big doofus!<10_4 /> Don't say it, !
I remember you tellin' me about your hobby once So are you still into now?
Good to hear! 'Cause I sorta already told you liked . If you'd changed hobbies in the meantime, I'd look like a big doofus!<10_4 /> Don't say it, !
Quick question, You, uh, did tell me you were great at , right? That's still your thing, ain't it?
That's good to hear! 'Cause I've been tellin' folks you were our local expert at . I'd hate to think I've been leadin' everyone astray, !
Quick question, You, uh, did tell me you were great at , right? That's still your thing, ain't it?
That's good to hear! 'Cause I've been tellin' folks you were our local expert at . I'd hate to think I've been leadin' everyone astray, !
So I sorta happened to overhear somethin' about you,
Is it true you're sorta obsessed with ?
If I was to make a top-ten list of , a buncha my favorites would be . You and I really click, !
, huh? Now I'm curiousWhenever you get a chance, I sure wouldn't mind hearin' some of your recommendations, .
Is it true you're sorta obsessed with ?
If I was to make my top-ten list of , a buncha my faves would be You and I really click, !
, huh? Now I'm curiousWhenever you get a chance, I sure wouldn't mind hearin' some of your recommendations, .
It was you that said you really like , right?
Thought so! Guess I gotta try to keep around.Seems like the neighborly thing to try to do, .
Guess I remembered right. Ain't my favorite, but you like what you like, . And if that just happens to be , I say go for it!
It was you that said you really like , right?
Right, Gotta remember to keep that around for you.Seems like the neighborly thing to try to do, .
Guess I remembered right. Ain't my favorite, but you like what you like, . And if that just happens to be , I say go for it!
Do you still wanna be someday?
Must be motivatin' to have a dream to work toward, Well, I know I'm rootin' for you. Show 'em all and be the best ever!
I may not know what goes into becomin' , but you'll be great! I know you can do anythin' you set your mind to doin', !
Must be motivatin' to have a dream to work toward, Well, I know I'm rootin' for you. Show 'em all and be the best ever!
Reckon you'll make a great .I know you can do anythin' you set your mind to doin', !
I'm a fan of too! Nothin' like a hobby you can lose yourself in for hours, .
, huh? Might not be my thing, but good for you.Tell me all about it sometime, yeah? Been lookin' for somethin' new to get obsessed with,
You know where it's at! I love too!Nothin' like a hobby you can lose yourself in for hours, .
, huh? Not my thing, but good for you.Tell me all about it sometime, yeah? Been lookin' for somethin' new to get obsessed with,
So I hear you're pretty good at
You could say that. I sure am!
Color me impressed! I'm into tooAin't room on this island for two of us, . Gahaha, I was just messin' with you!
I don't know the least bit about myselfBut, hey, gimme a demo sometime and I bet I could pick it up!
So I hear you're pretty good at
You could say that. I sure am!
Color me impressed! I'm into tooAin't room on this island for two of us, . Gahaha, I was just messin' with you!
I don't know the least bit about myselfBut, hey, gimme a demo sometime and I bet I could pick it up!
Is it true what I heard? That you don't care about music, ?
I guess it is. Yeah, that's true.
Not anymore, it isn't. No, that's changed.
So I hear you're not much of a reader, ?
I guess I'm not. Yeah, that's true.
Not true anymore. No, that's changed.
Word is you ain't a fan of comics. Is that true, ?
I guess I'm not. Yeah, that's true.
Not true anymore. No, that's changed.
Is it true you don't watch movies much at all, ?
I guess I don't. Yeah, that's true.
Not true anymore. No, that's changed.
So I hear you're not much of a TV watcher, ?
I guess I'm not. Yeah, that's true.
Not true anymore. No, that's changed.
So is it true that you ain't exactly a big sports fan, ?
I guess I'm not. Yeah, that's true.
Not anymore, it isn't. No, that's changed.
Is it true you don't have a favorite go-to drink order, ?
I guess I don't. Yeah, that's true.
Not anymore, it isn't. No, that's changed.
Is it true you don't have a favorite food order, ?
I guess I don't. Yeah, that's true.
Not anymore, it isn't. No, that's changed.
Is it true there's nothin' you dream about bein' someday, ?
I guess there isn't. Yeah, that's true.
No, I have a dream. I've changed my mind.
I heard you don't have a hobby. So is that true, ?
I guess I don't. Yeah, that's true.
No, I have a hobby. I've changed my mind.
Is there really nothin' you think you're skilled at, ?
Yeah, that's true. It's true, there isn't.
That's not true now. No, that's changed.
Gotcha! Just wanted to hear it straight from the source.
Oh yeah? Just shows what I know
Hold up. Did I hear you right? ?
That's not right. Wait a second...
Guess you oughta tell me again.
Hey, quit messin' with me. You do like !
Hey, quit messin' with me. You do like !
So you do like ? Stop messin' with me!
So you really do like ? Stop messin' with me!
So you really do wanna be someday? I knew it!
Still or nothin', huh? I knew it!
So you were just messin' with me? I knew you liked !
So you were just messin' with me? That means I was right that you like !
So you were just messin' with me? I was right that you're a real whiz at !
So you were just messin' with me? I was right that you're a real whiz at !
Wow, now I dunno what to think You zigged when I thought you'd zag.You're kinda like a riddle wrapped up in an onion, kiddo. Lotsa layers to peel back, plus my eyes are waterin'.
What kinda music do you like listenin' to, ?
Is that right? So what kinda music do you listen to now, ?
OK then, so what actually is your favorite kinda music, ?

Aw yeah! Who doesn't like rockin' out to some cool tunes? NO ONE, that's who! C'mon, let's rock out! Yeah! Yeah, you're gettin' it! OK, guitar solo now Shred! Ba da baaaah bump, BA BA! Whew, better sit down a spell

Ain't it just the coolest music? No matter how much jazz I listen to, I never stop bein' surprised by it. The best jazz players know just when to try somethin' you never expected. And how to give you what you need. Glad you're a fan too, !

I knew you had to be a metalhead! Folks think it's all just spandex and wizards, but you and I know better! It's the thinkin' 's music, a way to scream out all the thoughts crowdin' your noggin, get 'em heard. And a whole lotta guitar thrashin' helps with the gettin' heard part! Grrrr-wow, nyow nyow, yah YAH!
, huh? So that's what you like.I should give it a listen sometime, maybe see if I can get into it too.

Huh. Well, I guess there's other stuff to listen to, like tweetin' birds or chirpin' crickets and whatnotI'm sorry, I justI just don't get not carin' about your music at all.I meanhow can you decide how to organize your vinyl collection if you don't care if it's by genre or decade?
What sorta stuff do you like to read, ?
Oh yeah? So what other kind of stuff are you readin', then?
OK, so what kinda stuff are you readin' these days, ?

You're into dictionaries, really? Rare to meet a fellow wordsmith!You mighta noticed that I like to mix things up with my language, sprinkle in some choice wordin' Dictionaries are chock-full of perfectly good, old words that no one but me uses anymore.

I've read my share of novels too. Granted, most of 'em were books from the Wolf Langley series Guess I'm just a sucker for edge- of-your-seat secret-agent stuff. Missin' plans, hidden documents Plus a lot of his stories get made into movies and TV shows with big explosions and jet planes!
Oh yeah? You like them big, artsy books full of glossy photos too? Those are good for decoratin' Get yourself some nice picture books like that and you can class up your livin' room real quick!
, huh?If that's the kinda thing you're into readin', maybe I should give it a try
No time for readin', huh? Gotcha. You're one busy kiddo.
You into comics at all? What kind do you collect, ?
Is that right? So what sorta comics are you pickin' up?
OK, so what kinda comics are you collectin' lately, ?

Shoulda figured you as a fellow lover of the sci-fi genre! Real deep-thinkin' type, forward-lookin' kiddo like you We gotta stick together, 'cause we're the only ones that'll be ready for the robot uprisin' when it finally comes!

Historical comics, huh? I shoulda known you'd go for the brainy stuff.Mind you, there's someone close by that you can ask about bygone days any old time you want to, kiddo I might not be as entertainin' as one of your funnybooks, but I was around for a lot of history and I got stories

True life stories, huh? Nothin' wrong with that! Most folks'd never bother to read up on the lives of others You got a real curious nature, don'tcha? I can relate to that.Some folks lead unexpected lives. That character, for example Wow. Where to start?
, huh?If that's the kinda thing you're into collectin', maybe I should try it out
Not a collector, huh? Gotcha. Reckon it ain't for everyone
So what movies are you into watchin', ?
Oh, no? So what sorta flicks are we talkin' about?
OK, so what kinda movies are you watchin' lately, ?
Aw yeah, now we're talkin'! I love a good thriller movie.You seen the new Danger Force yet? It's even better than Terminal Action!

I get it. I like a good period piece.With fancy vintage costumes that take you back, like to when we wore them powdery wigs and lace collars Wait, I don't mean me, personally! C'mon, I don't look THAT old, do I?

You're into true life tales, huh? I'm a sucker for those too Usually they're real inspirin'. They'll start with someone who's bein' held down, but they manage to beat all the odds in the end Sorry, that might be a spoiler.
, huh?If that's the kinda films you're into watchin', maybe I should see some
Not a film fan, huh? Gotcha. Guess we don't all got hours to kill in the dark in some theater
So what TV shows are you into watchin', ?
Oh, no? So what sorta programs are we talkin' about?
OK, so what kinda programs are you watchin' lately, ?

Yeah? Me too—I love infotainment! Nothin' beats learnin' stuff while you lie on the sofa with your feet up! The other day, I woke up in the middle of learnin' about clams, or barnacles, or some such thing. Had some mighty strange dreams, but I was able to learn and digest my while restin' up! As you kiddos might say, I was doin' some serious multitaskin'. Gahaha!

I'm a real sitcom fanatic myself! Single-camera classics, multicam, animated, mockumentary style I got lotsa opinions. On laugh tracks, whether dramedies are sitcoms, and on how many subplots is too many. I should get you to read my pilot script sometime! It's about all these wacky characters on a little island

Aw yeah, TV was made for sports! I like to stock up on snacks and paint my face even when I watch at home. <10_10 />Go team! Go! Yeah! <10_9 />Before I know it I'm yippin' and hollerin' and workin' up a sweat! I'd love to catch a game with you sometime, whatever the sport! We can cheer ourselves hoarse!
, huh?If that's the kinda shows you're into watchin', maybe I should see some
Not a TV watcher, huh? Gotcha. Guess we don't all got hours to kill in front of the goggle-box
So you got a sport you're a fan of playin' or watchin', ?
Oh, no? So what kinda sport are we talkin' about?
Oh, no? So what sorta sport are you into now?

Rugby, huh? I love the sport myself! Rushin' into the scrum with a buncha your toughest pals, Especially rugby where you slam into other players with all your might.It's an intense sport, but there's a place on the pitch for players of any shape, skill, or size. And no matter how rough the game, all of 'em can get together and laugh about it over .

Judo, huh? That's a good pick. Martial arts like that are about lots more than just tusslin' on a mat You gotta learn focus and discipline before you can test your skill against anyone in the octagon, . My favorite thing about judo is that it teaches you the right way to fall. Now THAT is one good skill to have!

Is that right? Now there's a fun sport! Did a little sparrin' myself back in my day, .Boxing's a great workout, but maybe just a tad too much for this cussStill, I think I got the perfect build for spectatin'. Gahaha!
, huh?If that's the kinda sport you're into, maybe I should look into it
Not a sports fan, huh? Gotcha. Guess everyone can't get wound up about athletical-type stuff
So what's your go-to drink order when you're thirsty, ?
Oh, no? So what kinda drink are we talkin' about?
Oh, no? So what sorta thing are you into drinkin' now?
Just plain old water for you, huh? I like it. Basic, no nonsense, gets the thirst quenchin' done, .
Nothin' beats the smell of fresh coffee brewin' up in the mornin'! It's so invigoratin', Come to think of it, I could use a java pick-me-up right now, !
Is lemonade back in style again? I always liked my lemonade more on the tart side, Guess it only makes sense that a sourpuss like me has more of a taste for lemons than sugar
, huh?If that's the kinda thing you're into, maybe I should try it for myself
Don't care what you drink, huh? Gotcha. Guess it ain't exactly all that big a deal, really
So what's your go-to food order when you're hungry, ?
Oh, no? So what kinda food are we talkin' about?
So what sorta thing are you into eatin' now?
I love me some sushi! Ever been to one of them fancy places where your sushi comes by conveyor belt? It's a newfangled dinin' experience! A whole menu of options paradin' around your table,

Fried rice is pretty great, ain't it?That's a recipe that even someone as lazy as me can whip up at home. Just throw stuff in a pan and fry it. Plus everythin' tastes better fried! Wonder if I got any rice and veggies around to fry up now,
Can't go wrong with cheesecake! I usually avoid sweets, so I don't know much about it, . What kind you into? Let's see. You got your plain, chocolate, drizzled with syrup or caramel, lime, matcha
, huh?If that's the kinda thing you're into, maybe I should try it for myself
Don't care what you eat, huh? Gotcha. Guess it ain't exactly all that big a deal, really
Do you have a dream job you hope to be doin' someday, ?
Oh, no? So what kinda job are we talkin' about?
Oh, no? So what sorta thing do you dream of bein' now?

Long arm of the law, huh?You know what? I can see it Yeah, you'd be great at that!I watch a bunch of police procedural shows, so I'm somethin' of an expert.You'd fit right in with the cast of Undercover Precinct, rootin' out all them bad apples, .

So you wanna be an actor, do you? You do have the devastatin' good looks for it, I'll give you that But that celebrity lifestyle's a real buckin' bronco! You think you're on top of it all, then it throws you off! Hold on tight just as long as you can! Take it from me, them good looks won't last forever,

Look at you, the big business bigwig! You got some real gumption, kiddo.If I had your youth and confidence, maybe I'd have it in me to try to make it in the corporate world What'm I sayin'? Them starchy types with their fancy loafers would chew me up and spit me out, . Wait, I know! Maybe once you make it to the top floor, you could hire up your old pal ?
, huh?If that's the kinda thing you're into, maybe I should try it for myself
Don't have a dream job, huh? Gotcha. Guess it ain't exactly all that big a deal, really
Do you have a hobby you spend your spare time on, ?
Oh, no? So what kinda hobby are we talkin' about?
Oh, no? So what sorta thing do you do for fun lately?
That's a great hobby. You can use your camera to snap up moments and keep 'em forever, . That said, if you take any photos of me, make sure to get my good side. Good luck findin' it! Gahaha!

Reading's not just a great hobby It's good for you and it helps you expand your mind, . The other day I was readin' the latest Wolf Langley spy yarn and I learned somethin' about filin' systems Some classified stuff went missin', and our hero thought another country had stolen some files! Wolf Langley went overseas and poked all around before comin' up empty. No bad guys had his files. Turns out he'd just used the wrong kinda fasteners in that folder, so the papers came loose inside a cabinet.

Pottery, huh? Color me impressed! Dunno that messin' around with clay would relax me none, I never manage to squish all the air bubbles out of anythin' I make from clay, so my stuff blows up in the kiln.
, huh?If that's the kinda thing you're into, maybe I should try it for myself
Don't have a pastime, huh? Gotcha. Guess it ain't exactly all that big a deal, really
Is there somethin' you reckon you're really good at doin', ?
Oh, no? So what kinda skill are we talkin' about?
Oh, no? So what sorta thing have you gotten real good at lately?
So you're good at repairs, huh? Could use someone handy to take a look at a few things around my place. I managed to break a faucet once while I was tryin' to replace a light bulb in my kitchen, .
So you're a good swimmer, huh? Wish I could say that. I just sorta sink like a stone, . Maybe I could get you to show me what I'm doin' wrong sometime
So you're a magician? I'd love to see some of your best tricks sometimeDabbled a bit myself when I was young, but I was never much good at prestidigitatin', .
, huh?If that's what you're good at doin', maybe I should learn about it
Can't think of a skill you have, huh? No worries. Guess it ain't exactly all that big a deal, really
